descriptionlist.description:
Customize YouTube app like you want!

* Features

- Block All advertisment.

- iPad Style Ui & Keyboard.

- Play in Background.

- Oled Dark Mode For better Experiance Dark Mode.

- Age Restriction Play all Videos.

- Play High Quality Videos Over 3G/4G/5G.

- Customize The Tab Bar.

- Hide almost any unwanted Features.

- Customize Icon colors & Keyboard.

- Stream 4K Quality Videos.

- all Cercube Availble Features USing A Premium Paid Account-Optionaly if u want use it!.

- and much much more...

https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/hiwajaf
